Name: daft_lemming_6662
Text: Honestly, I find the endless fan theories about Geralt’s past and the Witcher timeline more confusing than illuminating—sometimes I think the lore gets lost in its own complexity.

Comments.Name: ebony_crane_1933
Comments.Text: Isn’t it possible that the real value lies not in unraveling every mystery, but in questioning why we're so obsessed with certainty in a universe built on ambiguity?
